data.persona: It's your watch, sire. I did my shift. Mind the ramparts in this rain, they are bloody slippery!
data.description:
You are in the Watchtower.
The tower is the largest section of the castle. It contains an observatory for nighttime scouting, but is also used by the wise men to study the stars. Armed guardsmen are always to be found keeping watch.
There's a bows and an alarm horn here.
The armed guardsmen is here.

You are carrying a bag, wearing a tunic and a boot, and wielding a crossbow, a ritual dagger, and a Daggers.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the equipment out of the rain
data.mid_motivation: I must maintain the equipment in good working order
data.long_motivation: I want to be ready in case the castle is attacked
